Package doa.engine.graphics

Class DoaFonts

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.graphics.DoaFonts
public final class DoaFonts
extends java.lang.Object
Responsible for providing a Factory to create Fonts for DoaEngine to use. This class is static, therefore has no objects.
Since:
DoaEngine 3.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.awt.Font> FONTS
    Collection that maps font names to fonts.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.awt.Font createFont​(@NotNull java.lang.String fontName, @NotNull java.lang.String fontFile)
    Creates a fonts, adds the created fonts to FONTS, and returns the newly created fonts.
    static java.awt.Font getFont​(@NotNull java.lang.String fontName)
    Conveniency method.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • FONTS

      public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.awt.Font> FONTS
      Collection that maps font names to fonts.

  • Method Details

    • createFont

      public static java.awt.Font createFont​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String fontName, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String fontFile) throws java.awt.FontFormatException, java.io.IOException
      Creates a fonts, adds the created fonts to FONTS, and returns the newly created fonts.
      Parameters:
      fontName - unique name of the font that will be created
      fontFile - path to the font on the disk
      Returns:
      the newly created font in FONTS whose name is fontName
      Throws:
      java.awt.FontFormatException - if the supplied font is bad
      java.io.IOException - if the font cannot be loaded by DoaEngine

    • getFont

      public static java.awt.Font getFont​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String fontName)
      Conveniency method. This method exists solely to reduce the amount of typing required while trying to retrieve a font from DoaFonts class. Calling this method is equivalent to calling: DoaFonts.FONTS.get(fontName);
      Parameters:
      fontName - name of the font that is trying to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the font in FONTS whose name is fontName
